scripts.build: npm run typecheck && npm run clean && npm run resizer:build && npm run sqiper:build && npm run resizer:zip && npm run sqiper:zip
scripts.resizer:deploy: gcloud beta functions deploy resizer --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-resource imgmgr-images --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region us-east1 --source gs://imgmgr-functions/resizer.zip --service-account serverless@imgmgr.iam.gserviceaccount.com --entry-point resizer
scripts.resizer:update: yarn clean && yarn typecheck && yarn resizer:build && yarn resizer:zip && yarn resizer:push && yarn resizer:deploy
scripts.sqiper:deploy: gcloud beta functions deploy sqiper --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-resource imgmgr-images --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region us-east1 --source gs://imgmgr-functions/sqiper.zip --service-account serverless@imgmgr.iam.gserviceaccount.com --entry-point sqiper --memory 512MB --timeout 120s
scripts.sqiper:update: yarn clean && yarn typecheck && yarn sqiper:build && yarn sqiper:zip && yarn sqiper:push && yarn sqiper:deploy
scripts.labeler:deploy: gcloud beta functions deploy labeler --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-resource imgmgr-images --trigger-event google.storage.object.finalize --region us-east1 --source gs://imgmgr-functions/labeler.zip --service-account serverless@imgmgr.iam.gserviceaccount.com --entry-point labeler
scripts.labeler:update: yarn clean && yarn typecheck && yarn labeler:build && yarn labeler:zip && yarn labeler:push && yarn labeler:deploy
